mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS "id", p.name AS "guid", p.hname AS "name", p.description AS "description", p.type AS "type", p.options AS "options" FROM ASMS AS p WHERE p.nav_parent_id = #{nav_parent_id} AND p.type LIKE 'page%'
SELECT p.id AS "id", p.name AS "guid", p.hname AS "name", p.description AS "description", p.type AS "type", p.options AS "options" FROM ASMS AS p WHERE p.nav_parent_id IS NULL AND p.type LIKE 'page%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASMS (name, hname, type, nav_parent_id, options) VALUES (#{guid}, #{name}, #{type}, #{nav_parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{options,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
